message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SI. 

The paper focuses on the task of forum thread summarization, which involves natural language processing and information retrieval techniques. Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also uses neural attention mechanisms, which falls under the scope of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Finally, the paper deals with online discussions, which could be considered as a social network analysis problem, falling under the scope of cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
